LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.FenceMode
Line tool: Automatically aligns and places objects continuously end-to-end, like a fence.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.W2WMode
Line tool: Automatically aligns and places objects continuously side-to-side, like a row of buildings.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.ChangeRandom
Line tool: Click to change the fixed random seed used to generate object variations.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.PointMode
Line tool: Place one object at a time using the standard game tool.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.StraightLine
Line tool: Place objects along a straight line from point A to point B.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.SimpleCurve
Line tool: Define a start and bend, then define end point.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.Circle
Line tool: Define the center of the circle, then set the radius.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.FixedLength
Line tool: Space items along the full length of the line from start to end, using the set spacing distance only as an approximation. If this is NOT set then items will be spaced exactly according to the set distance, even if it means they can't be placed along the full length of the line.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.RandomRotation
Line tool: Rotate each item randomly so they all face in different directions.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.SpacingModifiers
Line tool: Change the step size by holding down the shift key (step by 10m) or control key (step by 0.1m) when clicking.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.RotationModifiers
Line tool: Change the step size by holding down the shift key (rotate by 90°) or control key (rotate by 1°) when clicking.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.Spacing
Line tool: Objects will be spaced apart by this amount (or approximately this amount if fixed length spacing is selected).

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.Rotation
Line tool: Objects will be rotated by this amount.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.SpacingVariation
Line tool: Object spacing along the line will be varied by a random distance up to this maximum. Set to zero for precise placement.

LINETOOL.Title: LINETOOL_DESCRIPTION.OffsetVariation
Line tool: Objects will be randomly offset sideways from the line up to this maximum distance. Set to zero for precise placement.
